name: com.needle.xr.arsimulation
description:
Provides Editor / Desktop Standalone integration for use with Unity's multi-platform XR API.
=Supported Features=
-Efficient Background Rendering
-Plane Tracking
-Touch Input
-Pointcloud Detection
-Image Tracking
-Light Estimation
-Anchors
-Hit Testing
-Meshing
-CPU Image API

samples.description: Examples for simulated Planes, Pointclouds, Camera Image, Image Tracking, AR Meshing
